title: AN ACT relating to tax incentives for first-time home buyers.
subject: Banks and Financial Institutions
Real Estate
Reports Mandated
Taxation
Taxation, Income--Individual

abstracts.abstract: Create a new section of KRS Chapter 141 to define terms; establish a tax deduction for contributions made to an eligible savings account by a first-time home buyer and allow an exclusion from income for any interest earned from an eligible savings account of a first-time home buyer effective for taxable years beginning on or after January 1, 2026, but before January 1, 2036; require the Department of Revenue to report to the Legislative Research Commission and the Interim Joint Committee on Appropriations and Revenue; amend KRS 141.019 and 131.190 to conform.
